parameters.name: HealthCheckFailTimes
parameters.description: The number of consecutive failed health checks required for an application to be considered as unhealthy. Valid values: 1 to 10. Default value: 5.

parameters.name: HealthCheckHost
parameters.description: The domain name that is used for health checks. This parameter is empty by default.

parameters.name: HealthCheckHttpCode
parameters.description:
The HTTP status code returned for a successful health check. Valid values:

*   **http\_2xx** (default)
*   **http\_3xx**

parameters.name: HealthCheckInterval
parameters.description: The interval between two consecutive health checks. Unit: seconds. Valid values: **1** to **50**. Default value: **5**.

parameters.name: HealthCheckMethod
parameters.description:
The HTTP request method for health checks. Valid values:

*   **HEAD** (default): requests the headers of the resource.
*   **GET**: requests the specified resource and returns both the headers and entity body.

parameters.name: HealthCheckPort
parameters.description: The port used for health checks. Valid values: 1 to 65535. Default value: 80.

parameters.name: HealthCheckSuccTimes
parameters.description: The number of consecutive successful health checks required for an application to be considered as healthy. Valid values: 1 to 10. Default value: 2.

parameters.name: HealthCheckTimeout
parameters.description:
The timeout period of a health check response. If a backend ECS instance does not respond within the specified timeout period, the ECS instance fails the health check. Unit: seconds.\
Valid values: **1** to **100**.\
Default value: **3**.

parameters.name: HealthCheckType
parameters.description:
The health check type. By default, this parameter is left empty.

Valid values:

*   **l4**: Layer 4 health check.
*   **l7**: Layer 7 health check.

parameters.name: HealthCheckURI
parameters.description: The URI used for health checks. The URI must be **1** to **80** characters in length. Default value: "/".

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the application. The name must start with a lowercase letter and can contain lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-). The name must be 6 to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: Remarks
parameters.description: The remarks. This parameter is empty by default.

parameters.name: ServicePort
parameters.description: The server port. Valid values: 1 to 65535.

parameters.name: TargetPort
parameters.description: The backend port, which is also the service port of the application. Valid values: 1 to 65535.
